body_html: We should definitely fix the code to respect the alignment. But we first need to make sure we are not exposed to other problems by fixing this, in real models. Lambda will look into this in parallel and it might take a while. Meanwhile, I'll leave it up to him to propose what we should do to enable tftrt.

body: We should definitely fix the code to respect the alignment. But we first need to make sure we are not exposed to other problems by fixing this, in real models. Lambda will look into this in parallel and it might take a while. Meanwhile, I'll leave it up to him to propose what we should do to enable tftrt.
